item.title: Yet another unboxing of a Myo armband
item.description: This is probably the gazillionth unboxing of a Myo that surfaced the Internet, so I won’t bother you with too many comments. Let the images speak for themselves! :D P.S. The unlock gesture, “pinky to thumb”, is killing me. Need.more.practice!
